title: I Was Expelled From the Guild After My Past Achievements Were Tampered With and I Was Recognized as a Useless Burden, but I Was Picked up by the Daughter of the Country’s Top Nobleman and I’m on the Winning Side of Life. The Moment I Left, the Number of Members Dropped to Half? I’m Begging You, Can You Come Back? It’s Too Late Now - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Dense Protagonist   Former Hero   Guilds   Knights   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Sword And Magic
author: Taki
description:
“As of today, you are banned from this guild. You useless piece of baggage.”

Alto was suddenly summoned by Guildmaster and told that he was fired.

However, the girl whom he saved from being attacked is a noblewoman and she hires him as a knight.. 

I can’t believe I’m getting paid this much!

“What? Only this much for one day of work!”

“What? I have two days off a week?”

Unlike the black guilds that only use up their adventurers, the life of a knight is truly easy.

Alto is convinced that he has become a winner in life.

“He was the heart and soul of this guild! So how dare you fire him! I’m leaving this guild too!”

“You're leaving this guild too! You can’t just leave…”

On the other hand, the guild members who were angered by Alto’s firing left one after another.

Unbeknownst to Alto, the guild was on the verge of collapse.>
